author: cms-sw
body:
@cms-sw/generators-l2 We would like to drop the following MC generators:

* cascade
* charybdis
* herwig 6.520
* jimmy
* photos 215.5
* ~~pythia6~~
* ~~hydjet 1.9.1~~
* tauola 27.121.5
* toprex

These are ancient and not developed anymore
title: Drop legacy MC generators
